website_summaries.verdict: The 1,700-watt motor on this blender can handle most blending tasks, but it's still compact and convenient.
pros: Has Smart Technology to cool or warm whatever you're making
Efficient with strong motor and many rotations per minute
cons: Some reports of issues with the temperature function
The seal is prone to breaking and leaking

website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality blender with excellent functionality and power that gives consistent results.
pros: Users appreciated the capacity of this high-end version of the NutriBullet, as well as its powerful 1,700-watt motor
Owners report it is worth the higher price
cons: Some issues with leaking, although some found leaks could be reduced or eliminated by following the directions properly

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship, poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I'm so frustrated with this thing. I make smoothies almost everyday for breakfast. I purchased a new Nutribullet RX in May of 2016. It lasted about 8 months. Too much time had passed to return it either through Amazon or the Nutri bullet company. I need it, so i bought another one on May 20, 2017. Almost to the day, one year later, it broke, just stopped working. I have written the company asking to return it and get another one. and it's too late to return it to Amazon. Apparently, they only ;last about a year. Poor craftsmanship, poorly made. Save your self money and buy another brand. Thumbs down...
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Keene

customer_reviews.title: Worms in it, it doesn’t matter if you clean it!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t matter if you clean it, there’s small holes that are impossible to clean in the back base of the blade and that leads to microbes and now worms, it’s so disgusting, I had to throw out what I was cooking since I didn’t know the worms got in the food too, I soaked it in chlorine, you can see it in the photo. This is the second time it happens and bought a new one but I won’t use it or buy it anymore is so disgusting. I had to eat out cos I felt like throwing out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey G Rowling

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal!
customer_reviews.text: This machine blows away my existing Nutribullet 1200w blender (which still works perfectly after 6 years of 2-3 times a day use). I bought the Rx primarily for the extra capacity, and am super impressed with the quantity and precision of the engineering of the Rx. Cannot understand why anyone would choose a Vitamix or other overpriced machine over this Nutribullet model.
customer_reviews.author: James0063

customer_reviews.title: I got this for a Christmas present for my mom ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Christmas present for my mom and the day after Christmas she tries it for the first time and says the blade starting leaking and the smoothie inside started leaking throughout the whole machine. I asked for a return/replacement, and thankfully i was sent another blade replacement. When i got the new blade the first thing i did was pour water just inside the blade to see if it would leak.. and it did. Now i have two defective blades that leak. I will be returning all of it and getting my money back.
customer_reviews.author: nicole0594

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this item earlier this year and while i loved it early on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item earlier this year and while i loved it early on, it’s beginning to show significant signs of wear. I use it almost daily to make smoothies out of frozen fruit and water and the canister no longer stays locked into the base, requiring me to hold it securely while it blends. Otherwise the canister will end up on the counter or much worse, the floor. Any advice for getting the canister to stay on the base unaided? I need to love this guy again!!
customer_reviews.author: JennLynn

customer_reviews.title: Skip it.  Horrible design.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Leaks like crazy, you have to hand wash it. Leaked the 2nd time I used it. All of the container's leaked, was not an isolated issue like I thought at first. Bad design. I used it for bullet proof coffee and protein shakes. Bought a ninja, much more reliable and dishwasher safe,
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Beagles

customer_reviews.title: This works very well, all the soup function is ...
customer_reviews.text: This works very well, all the soup function is iffy (doesn't always work, and when it does it is after much effort). Caveat: this is very loud! Do not operate if someone is trying to sleep! Also, be sure the blade is very tight, else you'll have a messy leak. I bought a new one from a preferred seller (shipped new from Kohl's) but the company would not honor the extra 3 month extension of the warranty because the preferred seller wasn't an "authorized seller", and it took almost a week to get an answer about it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I had an old version of the NutriBullet for 5 years or so and I loved it. It eventually started to die so I decided to upgrade to this version. It cost more than the old version, but it is so much worse. It does not blend well at all. My smoothies are full of chunks no matter how long I seem to blend it. It does not blend ice or anything frozen well. It is definitely not worth $150, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Fast

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.  Base blade too small to be effective for large quantities of frozen fruits and veggies for smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: Have a 900 watt NutriBullet that I have used S for smoothies for 18 months. Wanted a bigger container to make multiple smoothies to freeze. It doesn't work. All the fruit and vegetables have to be almost completely thawed for it to blend. The blade in the larger base is the same size on the twice as small base on my 900 watt NutriBullet!! Everything gets trapped under the small blade and it just spins without blending. Pretty useless for the purpose of my purchase of the larger unit. My 900 watt NutriBullet blends everything that is frozen solid with no problems at all. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernDogs

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for smoothie connoisseurs
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it about a month. But my nutribullets (this is my 2nd one) are and have always been my best investment. They make my smoothies so smooth, no extra crap left over like blenders leave. And this one has a warning feature where I can make soup in it and heat it at the same time. It's so much quieter than my old one, and much larger...so I can make mine and my boyfriend's smoothies at the same time. I used to have to do one at a time before. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought the rx version after my regular nutri bullet suddenly just stopped working after about two years of using it. Tried to make soups, each one tasted really bad. It also makes very loud noise, like a loud drill.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy
customer_reviews.text: Of course, it works for blending smoothie and soup very well. But, boy, is it noisy! Blending smoothie in the morning before going to work sure will wake the neighbors up. They need to work on design for noise cancelation. It's the same problem with high speed Dyson products. We also tried it for frozen fruit playa bowls. Drier frozen stuff without adding liquid instantly clings to the walls and you would need to shake it up and run the blade once or twice again. This can be solved with easier blade switch design for drier frozen fruits.
customer_reviews.author: HAFIZ

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: This is My second try with this product and when it worked it was great but both have had issues with the power for different reasons....One of them I can only turn it on and off and nothing more. The other one I got for my parents and it has to be tapped on the side for it to work.....um...not that comforting. Sad that for something so simple as ON/OFF and a pulse button it is so poorly made. I would recommend otherwise for the functionality of the product...not the longevity.
customer_reviews.author: bkou

customer_reviews.title: BROKE After 2 Years Use, Made Regular Smoothies for the Kids 2-3 Times a Week
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my unit in March of 2017 and just the other day it crapped the bed. The blade stopped spinning, I smelled some electronics burning and had to disconnect the plug from the outlet to kill power (i.e. the power switch didn't work). I called customer service and they tried to sell me a new blade which I didn't see how that could resolve the problem. I have no plans to buy anything from nutribullet again. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: habanero151

customer_reviews.title: Staple for health living.
customer_reviews.text: This is one fabulous piece. I can't even call it a blender because I know of nothing that even comes close. We bought the large RX model and have used it for several months, nearly daily. Gave up the time intensive juicing/clean up in favor of this. I freeze cleaned, cut produce, everything from spinach to pineapple and oranges and it is ready on a moments notice to instantly whirl up a health drink [add a little liquid/juice for smooth blending] and additional superfood/herb/vitamins for a real power drink. Staple for healthy living.
customer_reviews.author: CBoenig

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for a couple years now, primarily for fruit smoothies, but also occasionally soup too. It works well, probably a bit stronger/faster than any other blender I've owned. It's noise level is typical of any blender. Cleaning it is about as difficult as any other blender. I don't have much use/need for the soupmaking function.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $ & poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. So loud you cant talk. Poor quality . Worst ever. Owned 6-8 nutribullets over the years that lasted for about 2 yrs ea. We make 2 smoothies every day. Thought this would be quieter. Purchased extended warranty but nutribullet argues & argues & piddles with stupid stuff like lets send you a new blade & other inane, ineffective timewasters. Meanwhile it keeps getting louder. Tiime to switch brands for good!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted to love this blender...but I’m disappointed. There are several design flaws. First, I hate that the blender automatically starts when you put it on...yes, there’s a power button, but it would be so easy to make a big mess. Second, although it blends smooth, there will STILL be chunks of frozen fruit. Third, the blade screws on and it’s easy to not have it tight enough and your liquid will leak out of the bottom. Lastly, and maybe worst of all, the motor HEATS UP whatever it blends...not good for smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Getting the extra protein in more enjoyable!
customer_reviews.text: Use mainly for smoothies that have frozen fruit or ice. Haven't tried out the heating cycle yet. Update review when I do. I had the 600w for years and it's finally on deaths door. It's been a work horse so I decided to upgrade. Even easier to use, seriously, just set cup on base and it starts. The standard cycle starts high speed then lowers for a few seconds then increases again. I never have to take the cup off and shake anymore because of that. Comes with a very nice recipe book for smoothies and soups. Been using daily for about a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!! I can stuff in all the raw ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh wow!!! This is the best!! I can stuff in all the raw butternut squash with my other ingredients and spices, push the heat button and in less than 10 minutes, I have homemade squash soup that used to take HOURS to cook. This is the best invention since the cell phone. No more canned soups and I can make this all organic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vase

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money in this brand.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my mom in May of last year (it was a gift) she started using it just a few days ago and says it doesn't have any power, the blades are blunt and in short the old blender she has at home works better than this Nutribullet Rx. Very disappointed in the purchase, for the price it has, I expected it to be a good product, dear reader, don't waste your money and better buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hersson Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blender !  LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: My dad LOVEs his bullet. Big and powerful. Blends up just about anything in way less than 1 min. Chops nuts, blends rolled oats into fluffy oat flour - way more tasty than wheat flour. Makes soup in a flash, yes, he knows not to over fill the blending container and NOT to exceed 1 minute blend time until pressure is released by slightly unscrewing the lid- you can hear the pressure release. My family has the smaller bullet and We use it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: 4evr MOM

customer_reviews.title: Meh. It does the job but not as effectively as you'd like.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple smoothie making option. While this does in fact make a good smoothie, you have to stop the machine several times, open the lid and push the contents around. (In other words, sort of like any relatively inexpensive blender the contents will occasionally get stuck/jammed and you have to manually assist them back into / around the blades). Also, this thing is VERY loud. I do like the size and convenience of the multiple containers, but buyer beware that it's not a "perfect" option.
customer_reviews.author: BostonBooks

customer_reviews.title: 1st unhappy purchase of anything made by Nutribullet
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of the same device. It is rather noisy. However this device does not seem to work as well as the 1st period a does not stay in place as easily as the 1st period I cannot seem to get the heat function to work. Nor can I get the control buttons and switches to work as described. Unit constantly jumping of track without me holding it. Never had that issue before .
customer_reviews.author: Angela Green

customer_reviews.title: On our way to Better Health
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase my husband and I have made in a very long time the NutriBullet RX is way better than the NutriBullet we are able to put apples carrots spinach nuts and water and Blended together and makes a delicious smoothie comes with a book also that gives you instructions on how to make smoothies and soups couldn't be more happier
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mahmood

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this. I want one thing done well, my smoothies, it does not disappoint. Very powerful. I don't want a million options and buttons, just one. I use it more because it's compact and does it's job well. Only complaint is all the plastic. The containers should be made of glass, I'm sure it's plastic to increase profit. For this price range, glass should be automatic. Even the cheap blenders have glass. It's just less toxic and wears better.
customer_reviews.author: H. Choi

customer_reviews.title: Eats blade assembly gaskets...
customer_reviews.text: I've had two chewed up now by the blade. I guess they get pulled in during blending. Also, my unit has an "off" taste, hot or cold blending. I've used it maybe 6 times in the two years I've had it for these reasons and I'm nervous due to the exploding blenders. Oh well....can't change it now. Wish I had gone with a regular Magic Bullet, though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh. First one died after two weeks. Amazon sent replacement. I think I would have been happier with a more traditional blender. And it doesn't help that I have to hold the cup in place while blending or else it jumps off the base.
customer_reviews.author: Informed Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but....
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for versatility, but you should probably just buy a high end blender. It slips a lot. Powerful when it works but has a really hard time with ice. You kind of have to make sure it's seated right a few times, or else your going to just watch it grind gears and generate smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Bammes

customer_reviews.title: I would love to give this 5 stars since it blends well
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this 5 stars since it blends well, which is what it is supposed to do. But... it has already started leaking and I have only had it for a month. I will contact the seller, Amazon Services LLC and see if they are willing to provide a replacement will update post after hearing from them. My first Nutribullet (an older version) worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Savvyshopper101

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This thing is probably capable of making a smoothie out of anything, but you'd better wear hearing protection. At least for your neighbors sake confine your smoothie making to daylight hours. It's just a little quieter than a chainsaw and in a small kitchen, well, I'll leave that to your imagination.
customer_reviews.author: James Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me!
customer_reviews.text: So far so great! This Nutribullet works like a charm whether I’m making a smoothie in the morning or hot soup for dinner, People..you can not leave the blade dirty full of food product in your sink and leave it there and expect it to be good as new..you have to wash this product. If you let it sit I’m sure it will get gross and nasty as some of the photos depicted. You do not get bugs or worms from one use and cleaning properly of the blade..just nasty! If you take care of this machine it will take care of you! Plain and simple. I Love this Nutribullet and it’s working great for me no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: I Feel Good and I am doing something healty for my Body
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the 2nd one that I purchased. I have been using it for about 3 years. I make a shake every morning. I know that I am putting something really healthy into my everyday and it makes me feel full. When I first started using the Nutri-Bullet I was overweight, since I have been using this, my weight has gone and easier to maintain. There used to be a lot more supplements from Nutri-Bullet but they are really hard to find now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but very big and bulky! Tough to store cause it takes up tons of space. It does however function as described!
customer_reviews.author: CaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Blade doesn't engage worst customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible. I tried to get assistance from customer service and they sent me the same part I said wasn't working. Can't make a smoothie without adding tons of liquid might as well drink juice. I tried to call a second time for assistance and all they wanted to do is have me buy the same part that they sent me that didn't work. If you get one that works great, but hope nothing goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Ryezen

customer_reviews.title: over all im happy with it
customer_reviews.text: works well, yes the o-ring occasionally comes out but to clean the machine well you want to remove that o-ring and wash it anyway; over all im happy with it, try to get it durring a sale because im not sure id be so happy if i paid the full $200, basically a really nice blender
customer_reviews.author: Amazon1

customer_reviews.title: This blender is awesome. I make a shake for breakfast every morning
customer_reviews.text: I have the original Bullet Blender, the first NutriBullet and now the Rx. This blender is awesome. I make a shake for breakfast every morning. sometimes I add frozen fruits of fresh greens. Always 2 to 3 ice cubes and some supplements (tablets). It always completely liquifies whatever I put in. I would put this blender up against the Ninja and know that it will always outperform the Ninja. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Flo L.

customer_reviews.title: good but noisy and acrid burning smell
customer_reviews.text: I like Magic Bullet NutriBullet Rx N17-1001 Blender because it blends well, but when I use it, it gives off strong acrid burning smell that is often associated with electronics. It is also very loud like a broken fan.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brushchenko

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I'm not understanding. I had a regular nutribullet for 6 years. Now that I've upgraded to the fancier version , it's not working after 6 months. The heat feature isn't working and it sounds like a Dodge Hemi when I try to blend up my smoothie. I'm incredibly disappointed. :(
customer_reviews.author: JSimone

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the item early December and loved it. Unfortunately, 6 months later I do not feel the same. When I use the Bullet, the item starts great and about 10 seconds later the pitcher starts bouncing around and things stop blending well. Plus, the piece with the blades has begun to leak into the base where it connects to the motor. Very disappointing in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: mike bradford

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product - Totally love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about my NutriBullet Rx Blender!! I use it to blend my veggie and fruit smoothies and it id amazing! It totally blends every little piece of all my fruits and veggies. The texture of the smoothies are very smooth and satisfying! The cleanup is a breeze. I have used other blenders but nothing can compare with this NutriBullet Rx blender!! I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Vernice Carmicle

customer_reviews.title: Performs as claimed
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, it really is and does what it says. How people can eat this stuff though is beyond me as I find it nasty. I would rather just eat the food. But everybody has an opinion and I can have mine. Just goes to show people will eat anything. The product itself is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: W. heath

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is powerful and really gets the job done! Mine came with a handle tool to remove the bottoms (they get tight after the blend sometime) I’ve put lemons with rinds spinach kale apples carrots all in the same mix and it’s come out silky! Great buy
customer_reviews.author: jazzy

customer_reviews.title: but I know this is a great product! And I had NO problems exchanging a ...
customer_reviews.text: This one leaked, I was told (it was a gift), but I know this is a great product! And I had NO problems exchanging a for new one, soon to arrive,
customer_reviews.author: IM

customer_reviews.title: Love'n it
customer_reviews.text: It has too many pitchers...... I just like the smaller one, which is still large for a single serving. But it gets the job done, I put in greens and they are completely liquefied! Also works well with frozen fruit too.
customer_reviews.author: Rini

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality - after 60 days
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product 60 days ago . It worked perfect till now 20 January 2020 . The product bottom plastic it’s leaking . It does leak after filling it up with liquid. Bad product . The motor and everything else works , but this product it’s no good without the cap which seals the vase .
customer_reviews.author: Freddy J.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender. Extra large cups, much improved blend blades....more robust. Comes with a special wrench to remove when "vacuum locked." Suction cup on bottom of motor is a great addition and stops unit from vibrating on counter. On/off switch and auto start/stop is also nice. Top-notch craftsmanship. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Dwain McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Ninja VS Nutribullet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a Ninja and this Nutribullet and figured I would see which was the best unit. This blender is WAY too large. It is not really a individual portion blender but rather a massive full-size blender that incidentally looks like an individual sized blender. I kept the Ninja.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Blend your way to healthy eating
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender and use it at least one to two times a day. Nothing helps you achieve a more nutritious diet than drinking your vitamins and minerals. This does a pretty decent job of chopping leafy greens, carrots, nuts, and fruits. I sneak veggies into my kids' smoothies, and they can't even tell. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great for green smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I use the Nutribullet Rx exclusively for vacuum blended green smoothies. (I made modifications, so bye-bye warranty.) In addition to its incredible power, I like the automated feature of the one minute run time.
customer_reviews.author: ebillcoyne

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It works great for smoothies, is easy to clean and I can drink from the same cup I made it in. I adore my Blendtec and for bigger things or if I need to pulverize a brick or something I still pull that out but for everyday smoothies this is so much handier and takes far less space on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Kee

customer_reviews.title: A must have in my kitchen to eat health AND enjoy!
customer_reviews.text: Best choice ever! Perfect for my smoothies, I can hide all kinds of vegetable in my smoothie and enjoy. The soup is wonderful and I'm not a huge soup fan, but this stuff comes out wonderful. If mine ever breaks I'm replacing it within the week. A must have in my kitchen to eat health AND enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: pairofducks

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Use this daily. No leaks as others commented on. We always use the tool to open/close the lid and never overfill. Only sad thing is can't use this for dry blending, only liquids. Still love it.
customer_reviews.author: amazonismyfavestore

customer_reviews.title: Works well but funny smell
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is so simple - fill it up with the ingredients as directed and turn it on - voila, you have a tasty smoothie. However, I am finding that I get a slight smell of burning rubber every time I use it. Not sure if I should be worried about that??? have not yet tried the soup (heating) function. I handwash the blade and cup right after each use - very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen W.

customer_reviews.title: Makes the Best Smoothies and Perfectly Crushes the Ice
customer_reviews.text: Love this Magic Bullet NutriBullet Rex except for one thing. So far I have only used the largest container and it leaks. I have checked and it I'd definitely on as tight as possible. Does not do it all the time though. Makes great smoothies and that is about all I do for noe. Helps me with my diet!
customer_reviews.author: YorkieMom315

customer_reviews.title: This is better than most and for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best! We had the smaller one which lasted for years then recently upgraded. Love the new features and the bigger cup sizes. We use it for our daily veggie smoothies but have made soup and even banana icecream with it.
customer_reviews.author: Weniki

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!! Blades still sharp after 3 years!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought one another one for my mother, as she loves how well ours blends!!
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Horrible blending capabilities and bad design
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t blend ice or anything chunky very well or even at all! There are always ice cubes left after blending for over a minute or two and the same goes for anything frozen that I put in it so making smoothies is absolutely impossible if you don’t want to be swallowing chunks
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Apparently not for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a year, stopped working as soon as the warranty was up (motor turns but not the blades). The customer service suggested that I purchase a new base for ~$95, I'll pass thanks
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Schartup

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about 2 months after having regular nutribullet for a couple of years! It’s so much more powerful and blends great. Love that the cycle runs through and stops on its own. Use mostly for smoothies!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Anne

customer_reviews.title: This poor thing hasn't gotten a break since I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: This poor thing hasn't gotten a break since I bought it last year. I am always on the run with kids and work and this has been a great way to get extra fruits and veggies into my routine. The only time I have had any leakage was when I accidentally went past the max fill line. Works great and it gets used 1-2 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: AColton

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive for about 5 weeks use kaput
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 1 month and 6days quit making a small fruit and veggie smoothie about 15 seconds after the pause feature not so smooth smoothie. Save rest of my review for their return and replacement policy.
customer_reviews.author: Sams Pugs

customer_reviews.title: Love my Bullet
customer_reviews.text: This things works great, cuts up all the ice nicely. I use it almost every day without any problems. Heavy duty and has a lot of attachments. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sue T

customer_reviews.title: 10 pcs literally means there are 10 items in the box total
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that if you're like me and you thought that that "10 pcs" meant that you would get extra mixing and serving cups you're going to be disappointed. The "10 pcs" literally means that there are 10 items in the box. And spolier alert, one of those items is the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice upgrade from my previous Nutribullet. It's larger and has more accessories like different types of lids and different pitcher sizes. I use it daily and I can tell it will hold up for several years like my last one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This is a wow product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third. Nutri bullet and absolutely the best. I have arthritis and the handle to open or close it, so it doesn't leak is what I need. It works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Desmarais

customer_reviews.title: A good way to make smoothies
customer_reviews.text: A good way to make smoothies, the only problem that I have is that if you don't torque,and I mean torque, the base on this machine it leaks and makes a mess other than that it will crunch,crush, and thoroughly blend just about anything you want done.
customer_reviews.author: stone meadows

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great!, blends everything so well, doesn’t leave behind chunks so my smoothie is smooth drinking. Auto shut off once it’s done. Getting my veggies in everyday with a quick smoothie. All different size cups with handles so don’t have to switch glasses to drink. No disappointment here, we love using ours.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Knobloch

customer_reviews.title: Magic Bullet RX NutriBullet
customer_reviews.text: I love this appliance! It really does mix the ingredients well and you can tell the difference. I already have a vita mix that I was using and now it sits on the counter, lol. I haven't had any of the problems with it that others have mentioned. Just throw in the veggies, fruit and liquid of your choice and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: Super buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy to have the NutriBullet Rx. I had Vitamix before and was happy to, but it broke after 13 months on one - two times use per week. I was very careful to not to put big chunks of vegetables but it didn't help. I'm very pleased that it takes only one minute to get very smooth drink from carrots, kale, spinach etc.. I'm recommending to buy and use NutriBullet Rx with all my heart. I love the smoothies and they are coming absolutely perfect from Nutribullet Rx.
customer_reviews.author: Katwona

customer_reviews.title: The best ever for smoothie
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this blender. This is the best ever for all my smoothie. Now I love to make my smoothie anytime and anyday. Producers of this product should keep it up. Thank you so much...
customer_reviews.author: Amaka M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Best blender I've had yet
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this blender for a few month’s now and i love it! This blender will make a smoothie or soup out of almost anything. put nuts and oats in my breakfast shakes and it blends them up perfectly. The only complaint I would have about it is that its loud, however compared to the cheap blenders and the ninja blender I had before this this one is the quietest.
customer_reviews.author: Novel

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my mom and she was super excited, still is
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she was super excited, still is. However, I've used it a handful of times and it just never blends 100%. Sometimes, the ice isn't fully crushed, the fruit isn't fully blended. Next purchase for her will be a Ninja.
customer_reviews.author: Shari J.

customer_reviews.title: No more chunky smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. It has metal gears instead of the plastic on the regular nutribullet. It makes a creamy smoothie. I love not finding bits of kale. The large cups are perfect for two people.
customer_reviews.author: eeksmom

customer_reviews.title: It is used several times a day
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and her family. The love making smoothies, soups and other quick things.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Mordecai

customer_reviews.title: Two month lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I born on June 19 it is August 11 and it broke 10 minutes ago. Tomorrow comes on spoons but the food is not mixing. It also doesn't work with the old models. I still like it and I am considering ordering another one and having it shipped to me today.
customer_reviews.author: Downlaw

customer_reviews.title: Drink up! Cheers!
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble digesting raw greens, and because I don't eat any dairy, I need 'em! I've been drinking my greens every day (with fruit and other great stuff like flax and maca.) I love my potions, and hopefully they're helping to strengthen my bones. I've never felt physically better!
customer_reviews.author: My Little Blue Heron

customer_reviews.title: Great blending power!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the price and so much easier to clean and assemble than a juicer. It’s helped cut back on produce waste since I just freeze anything in danger of rotting to make into smoothies. Seal hasn’t been an issue so far but I was warned to use the hand crank to prevent that - hoping to pass that info on to other people interested.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Gears wore out
customer_reviews.text: The blender did great...until the gears wore out. We used it pretty regularly and eventually in less than a year, the metal wore out and it lost significant traction. I expected a longer life for the price of the product
customer_reviews.author: bernie

customer_reviews.title: Not in for the long haul
customer_reviews.text: This is my second nutribullet rx. I use it once every day, 5 days week. And this is the second one that has stopped working after one year. Literally two weeks after. I LOVE the machine. But I'd suggest finding something else if needing it for every day use!

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Smart Blender
customer_reviews.text: This an awesome blender! This blender has a powerful 1700 watt motor and emulsifies with ease! Plus you can make piping hot soups! Plus this blender is automatic; it stops automatically when it's done blending and it's easy to clean. It does have an app, but I have not used it yet. But, I do love this blender.
customer_reviews.author: eberengue

customer_reviews.title: College Kids Durable
customer_reviews.text: Multiple smoothies in the morning & evening call for a well machined blender. This is it. Bought for grandson and discovered his friends bring their “raw” ingredients over to use this blender. Can’t get any better endorsement than that!
customer_reviews.author: Sybil

customer_reviews.title: Beware of seller!
customer_reviews.text: I owned a NutriBullet that I purchased from the store and it worked fantastic! I decided to order another from Amazon and this one barely can chop up my greens for my smoothie. I have to constantly stop to stir up the items in order for it to blend. I have only used it a few times and I have had these problems since first time using it! I truly believe this was a used item because the blades are very dull!!
customer_reviews.author: rhonda hampton

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I abuse this blender mercilessly and it just keeps going. I did seriously over fill it once and it got a little smoky smell, but thank to the on/off button I didn't completely fry it. That was months ago and it's still grinding out raw veggie smoothies with raw almonds and frozen berries. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: distorteddogma

customer_reviews.title: Nutribullet RX best price and quality. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for your kitchen!!! The Nutribullet RX it’s hands down the best. This specific vender had the best online price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: It's big, heavy and noisy
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure about this product. I haven't used it too much because it' cumbersome. My daughter likes it and that's why I bought it but it's just too much for me. I really liked the magic bullet much better.
customer_reviews.author: debra lippi

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is even better than I hoped it would be. It is as easy & amazing as all the claims & reviews. It's such a breeze to make a healthy smoothie w/in mins w/o having to do a lot of prep work. I was equally amazed at how easy, delicious & hot it make a healthy soup in just minutes. I'm so glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Johnson

customer_reviews.title: 3rd upgrade, loving it
customer_reviews.text: love that it has more power and knows when to stop . I started with the magic bullet, and then the 900 wish i would have stepped up to the RX a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We like this Magic Bullet NutriBullet, easy to use....Everyone should have one in their house
customer_reviews.author: Perf

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Had one overseas and had to give away, so we had to make this purchase once we returned to the US. So many uses, and not just for smoothies. Did not have any issue, when using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cerulean

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ love this so much.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I have ever purchased. It can blend anything (including hard things like nuts). The recipe book is a great resource, and everything cleans easily. I also love the accessories.high quality product
customer_reviews.author: Jean Mckelvey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this version of the nutri bullet. I'm able to make large smoothies, it starts and stops on its own and most importantly it can liquefy anything I put in it. I gave my older version to my son and I told the family, "this one is mine, hands off!" LOL
customer_reviews.author: The Annointedd Notary Svcs

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Lost a star because it doesn’t pulverize raspberry seeds but kills all nuts!! Very impressed with how quick everything is made!! Doesn’t take a lot of space either!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use, fun to experiment with mixing flavors. Definitely a must have when you are trying to be more health conscious. Easy to clean and store as well, it takes up minimum space.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Love my Nutribullet RX!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my purchase. I used to have a Ninja 1500 watt mixer that made great juices and smoothies but the clean-up was always a hassle. The clean up on this is so much easier and this baby is so powerful - it really mixes everything up great. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: R. MONTEFUSCO

customer_reviews.title: they don't offer a smaller one for this supposedly better motorized one
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work the same as my old one. The containers are too big, they don't offer a smaller one for this supposedly better motorized one, regretful purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TheLadyA

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product for smoothies! It doesn’t blend all the frozen items & you can’t make it like a milkshake because what it does blend it melts into liquid. Hate it!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Povlovich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product was great and loved it, but today I used the short cup and when I stopped the blender I saw a long crack! I have to contact the seller and get a replacement. Update: I contacted the seller and they sent me a replacement. Excellent customer service. I love this blender!
customer_reviews.author: Evangelina  Canedo

customer_reviews.title: Lost five pounds in month
customer_reviews.text: This is my second NutriBullet Rx. I had a power purge, then my first NutriBullet wouldn't start. The old one was seven years old and used almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Poor condition
customer_reviews.text: This was a refurbished item supposedly in very good condition, however I didn’t it acceptable. The items has an odor of curry with food residue all over the blender pieces. The clear plastic cups were cloudy showing signs of overuse and they hasn’t even been cleaned/washed! The package was in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: J

product_meta.title: NutriBullet Rx N17-1001 Blender, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackEat smart with the NutriBullet -the most technologically advanced NutriBullet to date. Powered by hands-free smart technology and a 1700-Watt motor, The NutriBullet RX breaks fruits, vegetables, nuts, seeds, and other superfoods down into silky-smooth beverages, unlocking the full range of nutrients they have to offer. The NutriBullet RX also features an all-new 7-minute heating cycle to make hot soups, sauces, and warm beverages. Included in the system is the nature's Prescription for optimum health book, which teaches you how to customize recipes to address your specific health needs. 2.3 Horsepower Motor
feature_bullets: This product is manufactured in compliance with US & Canadian Electrical Standards
Smart Technology with Auto Start/Stop Functionality
1700 watt motor. The short cup is 30 ounce and the pitcher is 1 liter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,371 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
